description: Creates a provisioning template. Requires permission to access the CreateProvisioningTemplate action.

parameters.name: templateName
parameters.description: The name of the provisioning template.

parameters.name: templateBody
parameters.description: The JSON formatted contents of the provisioning template.

parameters.name: provisioningRoleArn
parameters.description: The role ARN for the role associated with the provisioning template. This IoT role grants permission to provision a device.

parameters.name: preProvisioningHook
parameters.description: Creates a pre-provisioning hook template. Only supports template of type FLEET_PROVISIONING. For more information about provisioning template types, see type. payloadVersion (string) --- The payload that was sent to the target function. Note: Only Lambda functions are currently supported. The ARN of the target function. Note: Only Lambda functions are currently supported.

nested_params.name: payloadVersion
nested_params.description: The payload that was sent to the target function. Note: Only Lambda functions are currently supported.

nested_params.name: targetArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the target function. Note: Only Lambda functions are currently supported.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Metadata which can be used to manage the provisioning template. (dict) --- A set of key/value pairs that are used to manage the resource. The tag's key. Value (string) --- The tag's value.

nested_items.name: templateArn
nested_items.description: The ARN that identifies the provisioning template.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The name of the provisioning template.

nested_items.name: defaultVersionId
nested_items.description: The default version of the provisioning template.
